name: Ocean View Motel Ventura

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this via ebookers a few months ago and it said it was a new motel and as I could not find any reviews on tripadvisor I thought it must be true. It was actually far from true - it was old, run down and truly the worst hotel experience we have ever had - all 5 minutes of it as that is as long as we stayed! I am now writing this from the safety and luxury of a comfort inn further down the road!!
reviews.title: Dont Do It!! Disgusting Dirty Motel

reviews.text: Ocean View Motel is just disgusting - we took ourselves up to the room and it was so stinky we immediately opened all the windows and kept the door open. Then I inspected the bed and the sheets were dirty with hairs on it. The room was so dusty there was stuff hanging from the ceiling and there is absolutely nothing in the world that would get me to put my head on the pillows they provided. We had paid in advance and could not get any money back so just cut our losses and drove up the road towards LA a bit further where there are heaps of Comfort Inns, Days Inn etc for about $80 a night that are SO MUCH NICER - feels like the Hilton after the Ocean View Motel. Staff were also rude and smelly. Just dont stay there - EVER!!!
reviews.title: bed to sleep in at a low price

reviews.text: room was nothing special at all. pretty run down. our room wasnt as bad as previous entries but it wasnt great either. toilet set wriggled when you sat on it...that was weird. hot water, decent bed, we had just returned from camping for a night so anything seemed good. would only stay here again if was absolutely no way to get in anywhere else. definitely needs some tlc. advertised free wireless and they told us that wasnt working, we werent surprised.
reviews.title: Rundown Beyond Belief

aka: Ocean View Motel Ventura Hotel Ventura
